channel.title: MRAppStore on My Blog : Célestin HERNANDEZ
channel.description: Recent content in MRAppStore on My Blog : Célestin HERNANDEZ

item.title: Lecture 12 : Most Downloaded Application in the future MR App Store
item.description: Sketching and presenting three application that will be among the most downloaded in the future MR AppStore. Okay so I’m definetly not the best Paint3D user and the quality may not be top notch, but I do believe that drawings are the best way to convey ideas. I’ll present 3 basic app ideas that may not be revolutionnary but will sure be succesful if they end up actually existing. Your browser does not support the video tag.
